item.title: Global shares trade mixed as markets eye Fed decision
item.description: Global shares are trading mixed as markets look ahead to a possible U.S. Federal Reserve interest rate cut later this week

item.title: Fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk puts Utah Valley University's security under scrutiny
item.description: The fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk has put Utah Valley University under scrutiny as law enforcement experts say security was lacking.

item.title: North Korea nuclear weapons status 'irreversible,' state says
item.description: North Korean officials said its status as a country with nuclear weapons "has become irreversible," despite efforts by the West to negotiate an end to...

item.title: WATCH: Zoo throws birthday party for giant panda
item.description: The Smithsonian Zoo threw an adorable fourth birthday party for giant panda Qing Bao.
